Title: Enacts the renewable natural gas standard act
Summary: Enacts the "renewable natural gas standard act"; requires the public service commission to establish a program to require that gas corporations procure renewable natural gas from third-parties, including affiliates of the gas corporation, for distribution to natural gas customers.
LawCode: Add ยง66-x, amd ยง66-f, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to enacting the "renewable natural gas standard act"
